summary: THROTTLE STICKING RIGHT OFF IDLE.  VERY HARD TO DEPRESS ACCELERATOR PEDAL.  TRUCK "LEAPS" WHEN PEDAL FINALLY "FREES-UP".  HAS HAPPENED SEVERAL TIMES.  TOOK VEHICLE TO DEALER...DEALER UNAWARE OF ANY BULLETIN TO REPAIR PROPERLY.  DEALER RAN INJECTOR CLEANER THROUGH THE FUEL SYSTEM AND REPLACE FUEL FILTER.  THIS DID NOT FIX THE PROBLEM...DEALER DID NOT REPAIR ACCORDING TO THE SERVICE BULLETIN AVAILABLE.   *NLM
